meanings.definition: The act of coating food with breadcrumbs before cooking.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy the process of breading chicken before frying it.
meanings.sent2: The chef used breading to make the fish crispy.
meanings.sent3: The breading on the onion rings made them look like tiny edible nests.
meanings.sent4: The breading on the shrimp was like a golden blanket keeping them warm.
meanings.sent5: The breading added a crunchy layer to the dish, making it even more delicious.

meanings.definition: The breadcrumbs used to coat food before cooking.
meanings.sent1: The breading on the chicken nuggets was perfectly crispy.
meanings.sent2: She ran out of breading while making the schnitzel.
meanings.sent3: The raccoon mistook the breading for snow and tried to eat it.
meanings.sent4: The breading on the mozzarella sticks was like a delicious armor.
meanings.sent5: The breading on the fish fillet was so light and airy, it melted in your mouth.
